system.descriptionText: A Wearer with this System can make a +0 Tech-Use Test as a Half Action. If Successful, they can choose a number of targets up to their Perception Bonus. They and all their Allies within 20 metres can re-roll failed Ballistic Skill Tests against those Targets until the beginning of the Explorer's next Turn.
